text: Mother Wore Tights is a 1947 American musical movie directed by Walter Lang and is based on the 1944 novel of the same name by Miriam Young. It stars Betty Grable, Dan Dailey and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1947 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Mother Wore Tights
